QuestData.Title: REUSE ME
QuestData.Description:
Suddenly the lack of fae and souls makes much more sense. These vile creatures must have taken them as they took my husband.
But I will get them back. If you are our new champion then you will help me for the good of Ardenweald.
<Thiernas snorts.>
Death did not part us. I will not be torn from him now.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ride with Thiernax after the Drust.
